query:
SELECT t.id, t.name as turma, t.year, p.name as empresa, p.code as empresa_code, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alunos a WHERE a.turmaId = t.id) as total_alunos
FROM turmas t 
LEFT JOIN programs p ON t.programId = p.id 
ORDER BY p.name, t.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT t.id, t.name as turma, t.year, p.name as empresa, p.code as empresa_code, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alunos a WHERE a.turmaId = t.id) as total_alunos
FROM turmas t 
LEFT JOIN programs p ON t.programId = p.id 
ORDER BY p.name, t.name;
